name: Ticket to Hell
description:
Ticket to Hell is a short (5-10 min) psychological horror experience inspired by P.T. and old PSX horror games. 

Story

Live through the last nightmare of a bad person.

Time seemed to blur together over the past few years as you woke up each day wondering if today would be the day.

Today, you woke up in a strange house.

Controls

  • WASD - Movement (Can also use left analog stick on controller)
  • MOUSE - Camera control (Can also use right analog stick on controller)
  • SPACE - Skip current subtitle typewriting (Can also use A/✖ on controller)
  • ESC or P - Open a pause menu where you can change the volume and sensitivity

made for the Shacknews Jam Spring 2023 with the theme being "Retro"

if you have performance issues try turning on Hardware Acceleration in your browser.

The game is meant to be played in one sitting so it does not feature any saving.
